articles.title: Our Galaxy Actually Consumed A Smaller Galaxy Three Billion Years Ago - Chip Chick
articles.description: The Gaia spacecraft, launched in 2013 by the European Space Agency, is in the process of creating a detailed map of the Milky Way by tracing the positioning and movements of more than a billion
articles.content: The Gaia spacecraft, launched in 2013 by the European Space Agency, is in the process of creating a detailed map of the Milky Way by tracing the positioning and movements of more than a billion stars… [+2114 chars]
